name: Students of the Round
description:
Students of the Round is a first-person dungeon crawling RPG in the vein of Wizardry. It was originally developed for the PC by Experience Inc., and released in Japan on April 23, 2010.

The game has been ported to consoles twice. First a Xbox 360 port developed by Team Muramasa was released on February 10, 2011. Then a PSP port, named Students of the Round: The Eternal Legend, was released on October 11, 2012.
